name: Toolmeet
description: discover people and navigate in real tim
overview:
Firefox toolbar to discover people and navigate in real time with your facebook friends around the web.

With Toolmeet.com you can know who is on a website and chat with Them.

This application gives the possibility of discovering new sites and talk with people who have similar interests. For example, a user browsing websites or technology blogs can easily meet and chat with other people having the same interests, visit the same sites, using domains as virtual meeting places.

Toolmeet is not only this, each user can comment sites he wants and share them with his friends automatically, delivered directly to his Facebook profile. Within its own toolbar also can see the sites with more visitors at a that time and the comments to that domain.

“The project creates a new way of browsing the web, â€œjumpingâ€ between web pages and” following on-line ” friends, meeting people who share the same passions.” â€œIt is as if every website is a chat room where people inside are aggregate for related interests.â€œ

Toolmeet is completely free.
